about_the_game:
Originally released in the 1980s, this action-packed top-down vehicular combat game saw players take on the role of a lone road warrior fighting to protect the civilians driving the highways of the western frontier from the sinister Draconian League. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

This version of the game was originally published for the Commodore Amiga.

Gameplay

With your high-tech spy vehicle, take out the Draconian League cars, while they attempt to smash you off the road, slash your tires, or bomb you into oblivion with an assault helicopter. Your car comes equipped with machine guns, and if you can survive long enough you can obtain more state-of-the-art weapons and gadgets, from oil slicks and smoke screens, to missiles and more!


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options
